modName: Jaredschons and D13 Adv Dwarven all Bows Standalone Craftabl
summary: This is Standalone, Craftable Super awesome dwarwen bow from Advanced Alloys Dwarven Bow all in one textures by Jaredschons.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a lovely dwarven bow retextures, four in total and two quiver and arrow retextures.

News:
[color=orange]In cooperation with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3921199]Athyra[/url] this mod is now compatible with awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10037]ACE - Comprehensive Enhancements[/url]. I recommend to chect it out ;) [/color]

There is also a possibility [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5711]Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows[/url] version by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1900560]EvilDeadAsh34[/url] available, I highly recommend to download that mod as it adds to realism of archery in skyrim. A preview of the mod is made by [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/GophersVids]Gopher[/url] and can be found [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mC8l-7xv4FM]here[/url]

[color=lightgreen]I suck in making a proper screen shots so if you can make some nice pictures and upload it to me I'll give you a shout out and link in the description :P[/color]

All credits for the beautiful textures are going to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3505799]Jaredschons[/url] the original creator of the dwarwen retextures and a lot more screen shots can be found bellow:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14737]Advanced Alloys Dwarven Bow v2[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14844]Advanced Alloys Dwarven Bow and Quiver[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14404]Advanced Alloys Dwarven Bow[/url]

For more and better quality screen shots visit the original texture mod nexus page and please say thank you to him. All are listed above.

I just made them stand alone and craftable.

Once you unlock the Dwarven smith perk, you have to craft a dwarven bow and arrows in the smithing forge and then go to the Tanning rack to change the bow and arrow type.

They are a little bit lighter and tiny bit stronger, yet still balanced.

[color=orange]Please don't forget to endorse it will help other people to find the mod and make me very happy ;)[/color]

Thank you and enjoy.
Much Love D13
